ygData.subject: Help for a New Erudite Necro
ygData.msgSnippet: OK This is to fathom out wisdom and advice from those far wiser and MUCH higher level then I.  I am recently graduated from Necro High School and have begun to
ygData.messageBody:
OK This is to fathom out wisdom and advice from those
far wiser and MUCH higher level then I. I am recently
graduated from Necro High School and have begun to
venture out into the real world. Almost all advice
and things I ought to know would be helpfull. Have
never even gone over the bridge yet, and I party
almost exsclusively with my buddy who also is a Necro
of same level. As of yet we have kill Shintar twice,
eheheheh that was fun :-), whooped a lot of skells in
Paineel and gotten the free one handed bash from the
runnaway pet, killed the tratior that wants to fish.
Only did that once though, tough fight at level 5 for
the 2 of us. My buddy beat me to the loot, and then
got the 2 handed bash with the plus 1 int, which is
NOT magic. I intend to kill him soon for the free
fishing pole :-). Killed a lot of Kobolds and turned
in the cloth hats to the 2 mining skells in the tunnel
to Paineel, and sold the paws for a plat for 4. But
the horizon is calling out my name. O where to go,
what to do. What say ye to be that of best advantage
to a Necro such as myself.

Quizekil the Not Quite Sure How His Name is Spelled
Necro of the 5th rank of Drizzel Ro
